metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20451 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The process_file function in reader.c in libdoc through 2017-10-23 has a heap-based buffer over-read that allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: catdoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
